ygData.subject: Re: Thermal Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of the rare Gnome warrriors, they start with tattered tunics or cloaks i don t remember. Xenophile ... From: Chad Maloney
ygData.messageBody:
For those of the rare Gnome warrriors, they start with tattered tunics or
cloaks i don't remember.

Xenophile

-----Original Message-----
From: Chad Maloney [mailto:opercmm@...-hulman.edu]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 2:09 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Thermal Cloak


From: Chad Maloney <opercmm@...-hulman.edu>

Zach Heaven wrote:
> I found it odd that the book mentions this:
>
> The flask of firewater attached to my belt ... metal
> rod in the Tattered Gnomish Cloak.

Well, the flameless lantern uses the Firewater for power. The
firewater bottle is wired into a large lantern with the metal
coil.

So it seems reasonable to me that the thermal cloak is a
cloak combined with a belt and a bottle of firewater. Maybe
some metal rods or coils to conduct the heat generated
from the firewater.

Note that all that is speculation. Try it at your own
risk. Blah blah blah.

- Chad
